column2: Can't wait to see if someone can finally get to my level in Fizzics!
Let's go.
Excellent! Here goes! Launch the Fizzics game to get started.
See the Fizzics app on the desktop? Click it to launch.
Great. Now get to Level 8. That's where it really gets fun.
These work just like the others: fling the orange ball at the target.
Level 8! You made it! Okay, so give it a shot ;)
You're gonna need to hack the game to beat it. Press the Flip button.
Okay, see if you can beat the level now that you've seen into how it works!
You're gonna need to hack the game to beat it. Press the Flip button.
Oh no! One of your balls exploded. You're not going to be able to beat the level now, so press the Reset button.
See that button at the top with an arrow? That's the Reset button.
No, wait, go back to Level 8. You'll need to get through that one before going further.
Use the key that Ada gave you earlier. Click on that lock to access the Hack panel.
Just click on the lock and you're golden.
Amazing! You're in. Now just see what changes you need to make to beat the level.
Try making the radius really small.
Play around with the gravity and see what happens!
Slayyy! I knew you'd ace that. See you at the Clubhouse!
Hold on! You already beat Level 8? Brilliant. See you at the Clubhouse.
Check ya later! Come find me in the Clubhouse if you want to play again soon!
